decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 24th August 2016, and numbered PS-24SSH-01 and PS-24SSH-02, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The window formed in the side elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse known as "26 Sutton Square, Hounslow, TW5 0JQ" and shall not be occupied as primary residential accommodation or as a separate dwelling or for business use.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding to the rear garden of the house
